channel.title: My first render: Fable Evil Archer
channel.description:
I completed the game so i said meh why not make a screeny and render it, so this is what I made. Please tell me how I could Improve. [IMG]http://i14.tinypic.com/4kjn9lu.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i7.tinypic.com/61ki8sp.png[/img] Thanks for telling me how to crop fastballs.
Feel free to use!
